title: Equivalence of Deformations of Berglund H\"ubsch Mirror Pairs
authors: Alexander A. Belavin, Doron R. Gepner
abstract:
We investigate here the deformations of Berglund H\"ubsch loop and chain
mirrors where the original manifolds are defined in the same weighted
projective space. We show that the deformations are equivalent by two methods.
First, we map directly the two models to each other and show that the
deformations are the same for $79$ "Good" models, but not for the $77$ "Bad"
ones. We then investigate the orbifold of the mirror pair by the maximal
symmetry group and show that the number of deformations is the same and that
they are almost the same, i.e., the first four exponents of the deformations
are identical.
